record.title: Photograph of Ronald Reagan and Paul Laxalt sitting at the desk in the Oval Office, 1985
record.description: President Reagan and Senator Laxalt sitting the president's desk in the Oval Office discussing a summit meeting. Reagan wrote on the picture and signed it.
